pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.chinese: 喜馬拉雅山脈農家，卡林，不丹，1989。

sentences.english: India has pushed hard into Asia, pushing up the Himalaya Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 印度板塊艱難地擠向亞洲板塊，形成了喜馬拉雅山脈。

sentences.english: This temperature drop was triggered by the rise of the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 氣溫下降是由喜馬拉雅山脈隆起所致。

sentences.english: Beyond theHimalayas, both countries are enlarging their ecological footprint in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 在喜馬拉雅山脈以外，兩國都在亞洲擴大其生態足跡。

sentences.english: Mount Gaoligong is a southern extension on the east side of the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 高黎貢山是喜馬拉雅山脈的東部南延部分。

sentences.english: At the same time, the Beatles flew to foothills of the Himalayas to learn meditation.
sentences.chinese: 同時，披頭們飛到喜馬拉雅山脈的山麓下，學習冥想。

sentences.english: The Himalayas the Alps the Bermudas The Himalayas have a magnificent variety of plant .
sentences.chinese: 喜馬拉雅山脈有大量各種各樣的植物。

definition: Goddess peak (Nepalese: Sagarmatha, Sky Goddess)/refers to Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan), Chinese 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰/Mt Everest
Andes mountain chain of South America
Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China/Daxing'anling prefecture
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2
